title: HELL FROZEN OVER
description:
When winter arrives most people cozy up inside and enjoy the holidays. But when you are left outside in the cold, the chill can creep inside your bones. The blaring silence of the frigid outdoors can turn a winter wonderland into hell frozen over.

First, the frosty touch of death
Followed by a set of twins dying to survive
Then, panic in a crowd
Finally in our featured story, monsters trapped in ice
